abstract: Judge awards over 15 billion Canadian dollars, or $12 billion, to Quebec smokers in class-action lawsuit against tobacco companies JTI-Macdonald, Imperial Tobacco and Rothmans, Benson & Hedges.
lead_paragraph: A judge has awarded over 15 billion Canadian dollars ($12 billion) to Quebec smokers in a case that pitted them against three tobacco companies.

headline.main: In Canada, Tobacco Companies Will Pay Billions in Damages
